page.title: 12Employment _ in the Area
page.content: Much of the area is agricultural land so there is a background of employment in farming and agricultural services. However, with increased mechanisation,fewer people are employed on the land though there is seasonal work such as potato picking. Strangely enough there is the heavy engineering{Newell Dunford}works (manufacturing such things as huge crushers),{Brealeys}making conveyor belt machinery and{Misterton Castings ;these are all at Misterton as is the firm of{Corah}who mainly manufacture underwear and are the largest employers of female labour The three Trent Valley C.E.G.B. Stations are important employers. Residents commute to nearby towns such as Doncaster, Gainsborough, Retford and even Sheffield.
